Package logics

Interface Player

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GameObject, GameObjectWithPhysics, PlayerBody, RigidBody, Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    EnemyPlayer, MainPlayer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPlayer, EnemyPlayerImpl, MainPlayerImpl
    public interface Player
extends GameObjectWithPhysics, PlayerBody
    The abstract class Player contains the common fields and methods that can be found in any player of the game. Instances of the Player class are equivalent to the mallet they control.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      String getName()
      Returns the name of the player or an empty string if not set.
      Integer getScore()
      Get the current score of the player.
      void scorePoint()
      Score a point.
